section.heading: Post-graduate Legal Fellows.
section.text: Upon recommendation of the Dean of the University of the District of Columbia School of Law and approval of the President of the University, the University may enter into an agreement with a section 501(c)(3) not-for-profit organization to permit graduates of the University of the District of Columbia School of Law to serve as post-graduate legal fellows under the supervision of District of Columbia barred attorneys; provided, that such agreement shall be exempt from the requirements of Chapter 3A of Title 2, not including any applicable requirements imposed pursuant to § 1-204.51.
